About

So you’d like to learn more about jayholman.xyz. Well, this is probably the worst page for that! You should go to the other sections to see what it’s all about. But, if you insist, this is my website that I’m mostly using to learn on. I’ll practice constructing it in different ways and trying unique things. There will probably be lots of weird video embeds and tests, but it’s also all about adventure. I’ll add sections and create more posts about things I like doing. I’ve even put useful categories up top that will split the posts up, but, conveniently, you can also access all the posts on this page!
